attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
...in light of the BBC's science writers being swayed to tailor an apparently neutral article so it appeases the demands of a highly politicized environmental lobbyist, while brazenly agreeing to censor any opposing viewpoint.

I demand a say in something I pay £139.50 a year for, and I have not seen that from the BBC, who have repeatedly censored my views.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
